modName: Velothi Race - The True Chimer - DELETED
summary: A Chimer race mod that is more than just a reskin. Uses a custom race morph that alters the ears. This race was designed to look like an intermediate between the Altmer and the Dunmer.
descriptionHtml:
A Chimer race mod that is more than just a reskin. Uses a custom race morph that alters the ears. This race was designed to look like an intermediate between the Altmer and the Dunmer.

The face texture is from the Dunmer. This mod is compatible with any body mods, and should be compatible with anything that changes textures.

An spell gone wrong sends a Chimer unwittingly thousands of years into the future. Dazed and confused, they fall into an awaiting ambush by the Imperials and is arrested.
Without trial they are put on a wagon to await their execution.
-Unless of course you're playing an alternate beginning. Then make up your own back story.

Racial Ability - Destruction magic is 25% more powerful
Racial Power - For 60 seconds, Destruction magic costs less to cast.

Skill Bonus
Destruction 10
Conjuration 05
Illusion 10
Alteration 05
Archery 05

Short History
A group of Altmer, following the prophet Velothi, who spoke on the behalf of Boethiah, lead them North away from the Summerset Isles.
Boethiah told them of the lies of the Aedra, and of the ancestor god Trinimac. Boethiah consumed Trinimac and the Altmer followers of Veloth rubbed the excrement upon themselves, becoming the Chimer, or "Changed Ones"
Later, Azura cursed them, and they became the Dunmer or "Cursed Ones"
(Full story on UESP under Chimer)

The eyes in the picture are from Natural Eyes by nevenbridge
[url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?[/url]

Thanks to
Expired6978 for Racial Compatibility.
author: Hallgarth
